thread.title: State police: 1 killed in single car crash in Allen Parish
thread.title_full: State police: 1 killed in single car crash in Allen Parish - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: State police: 1 killed in single car crash in Allen Parish
text:
OBERLIN, La. (AP) - A single-vehicle crash has claimed the life of a 25-year-old Mamou man
State police Sgt. James Anderson said in a news release that car driven by Cody Hammon was eastbound on Louisiana Highway 26 east of Oberlin Sunday morning when his car ran off the road and struck a tree.
Anderson says Hammon was not wearing a seat belt and was ejected through the windshield. He says Hammon was pronounced dead at the scene.
